messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Let’s have a Pokémon battle!
Humph! But I’m gonna win!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
You beat me?!
You’ve got talent!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
It was fun battling!
Yup! I’m going to battle everyone!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Let’s have another Pokémon battle!
This time, I’m gonna win!
